name: Dinari TJX
description: The Dinari TJX dShares token (TJX.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TJX), a leading off-price retailer of apparel and home fashions in the United States and worldwide. Each TJX.d token is fully backed by a corresponding TJX share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, TJX.d offers investors access to TJX's equity with benefits such as 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
